el Gigante Gragas

La Chubacabra Nunu
El Diablo Nunu

btw, it's **La** Pantera Pantheon
If the word has a "o" or "e" at the end, then you put the "El" before it which means "The"
But, if it ends with an "a", then it will be "La"

Spanish is confusing.

YES! that's what I thought. with the boots, vest, wristbands, white pants, tiny cape, and belt. His belt could have the riot logo. He'd be pink, and not transparent.

and a tuxedo would be a good skin for him too since he talks about it soo much. call him 00Zac and make it a black tux, or Debonair Zac and make it white.

She's getting a Lunar Revel skin next patch, so at least she's getting one.

And then there's Zac, of course...
What is Lunar revel? I don't remember anything like that in season 4.

Lunar Revel is roughly timed with Chinese New Year, and the skins that come out for that event often take their inspiration from Eastern culture. There is a Firecracker Jinx skin currently on the PBE, and skins for Nidalee and Katarina as well.

Do the Nidalee and Katarina skins count as Lunar Revel? I thought they were part of the Warring Kingdoms set...although I could be unknowledgeable and not know that they're all together. Ah, never mind.

Warring Kingdoms also have some Eastern influence. All previous Warring Kingdoms skins (Xin, Jarvan, and Tryn) have been released as part of the past two Lunar Revel events. 

The Lunar Revel event as a whole is generally Eastern themed, and the Warring Kingdoms set within that depicts several different types of warriors.

So WK has a narrower focus, but still falls into the wider LR category.
personally,i would've like his Q to shoot a tiger head, so i can yell "Tiger Shot!" all the time
